name: The Trebleing Adventures of Bellboy
description:
A 2D Musical Platformer about a Bell! Use Tubas, Cymbals, and Flutes as you make your way through various levels filled with enemies and challenges.

Game doesnt work correctly, sadly.

either use scroll wheel or 1-3 numbers to switch tools

Press 'E' to use tools

We were a bit rushed for time, and didn't get everything we wanted in this game.
